mapper.select: select count(c.quota_id) as all_count, ( select count(*) from tb_school_collection where school_id=#{school_id} and report_id=#{report_id} and quota_id = c.quota_id) as school_count , c.quota_id from tb_collection as c inner join tb_schooltype_collection as tc on tc.collection_id = c.id where tc.school_type = #{school_type} GROUP BY c.quota_id
